knimeNode.name: Convert to R
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a data table as input and converts it into a generic R object.

fullDescription.intro:
Takes a data table as input and converts it into a generic R object.
Make sure that Rserve is running somewhere, and KNIME is accordingly configured (KNIME->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the R generic nodes:
Wiki on GitHub: knime-scripting

option.name: Chunk size to push incoming data

fullDescription.option: Number of columns to push as one data chunk to R. The default (-1) leads to data transfer without splitting the data in chunks.

ports.inPort: A data table which should be processed using non-table based GenericR pipeline.
ports.outPort: R workspace containing the input table as data frame
